criteria: All unit/integration tests for authentication and encryption passing; No secrets present in configuration files; Successful login E2E test; PoC meets performance goals.
success_metrics: Zero critical security vulnerabilities identified in code review.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Admin & Rendering Core
criteria: RBAC E2E tests passing for both roles; User creation is functional and audited; Core rendering control loads and displays monochrome and color DICOMs without memory leaks.
success_metrics: Admin functions work as specified; Viewer control is stable.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: Ingestion & Session Security
criteria: End-to-end DICOM ingestion from a test SCU is successful; Session lock/unlock flow is fully functional and preserves state; Progressive loading improves perceived performance on large studies.
success_metrics: System can reliably ingest data; Session security meets HIPAA requirements.

criteria: All viewer manipulation tools (WW/WL, Zoom, Pan) are smooth and intuitive; User can successfully query and retrieve a study from a test PACS.
success_metrics: Core clinical workflows are functional and performant.
